column2: Nova School of Business and Economics
column5: We are all interconnected. We are one across the globe. In this Master’s you will explore an international career where performing at your highest will become your everyday life: setting a brighter future for yourself and for others. This is where it all begins!Students graduating from this Master's typically pursue an international career in multinational companies in highly sought-after sectors such as Consulting, Tech or Financial markets.ProgramThe International Master’s in Management is directed at Bachelor's students who want to have an international career after their Master’s program and ambition a fast career progression in a multinational company.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
